title: Napfenyes Restaurant and Pizzeria - Napfenyes Etterem es Pizzeria
typeOfFood: Vegan, Pizza, Organic, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Juice bar, Hungarian
description: In March 2015 at this location, Napfenyes Etterem's main dining moved to a new space at Ferenciek tere 2. This space became a bistro where you'll find a daily menu, variety of pizza, a few soups and main dishes. Kitchen closes at 10:30pm. Jan 2016 owner reported no longer offering honey packets. Near metro Keleti Palyaudvar on M2(red) or Vorosmarty utca/Kodaly Korond on M1(yellow).
